quest.name: In the Line of Duty
journal: The face of an injured Sekiseigumi blade is twisted in pain.
objectives: Use the milky white salve on the injured Sekiseigumi blade.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: Ugh... <pant> I must...get word to my brother. But these wounds... I cannot.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: You... You don't look to be one of them. I take great risk trusting you, but I've no other choice. Nor the time. Please, hear me out.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: I am a blade of the Sekiseigumi, and I <wince> came under attack by a foreign devil while on patrol. I fear my fellow blade may meet with the same fate if not warned.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: I... I will survive. <grunt> But my Sekiseigumi brother must be told of this attack. He patrols an alley off Kogane Dori. Please, go with haste.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: I... I will survive. <grunt> But my Sekiseigumi brother must be told of this attack. He patrols an alley off Kogane Dori. Please, go with haste.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIB02814
dialogue.text: What do you want of me?

dialogue.name: SAMURAIB02814
dialogue.text: My brother blade? Attacked by a foreign devil? And one so skilled as to injure one of the Sekiseigumi's most gifted... Rushing after this fiend on my own would be rushing to my own death.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIB02814
dialogue.text: I would ask your help in this. Use this milky white salve on the injured Sekiseigumi blade that sent you to me. For my part, I will send for reinforcements from the barracks.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: Did you see word to my brother blade?

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: He sent you back with this salve? <groan> Thank you. And thank the gods he is safe.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: Worry not. My pain is mostly gone. My apologies for pulling you into this. But I see now I was right to trust you.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: As I told you, my attackers hail from across the seas. Violence is forbidden in Kugane, but those from abroad have little love for our laws.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: My brother blade and I broke up their illicit dealings some time ago. No doubt they did not take kindly to that. My guess is they gathered their gil and hired an assassin.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: Little did they know, we Sekiseigumi are not so easily killed. I hazard my brethren blades have already hunted these scoundrels down and gaoled them by now.

dialogue.name: SAMURAIA02814
dialogue.text: You did us a service this day. As one who wears the haori of the Sekiseigumi, on behalf of us all, I thank you.
